contest-event.event-date:
June 22, 1901 D Hardraw Scar
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £18, 2nd £12, 3rd £8, 4th £5, 5th £3. March contest - 1st(£2) Lee Mount, 2nd(£1) Irwell Springs. 14 bands entered, 5 competed.
Aug. 15, 2013, 2:38 p.m. June 21, 2018, 9:36 p.m.
1 Irwell Springs William Rimmer Songs of Scotland
2 Sowerby Bridge Subscription William Swingler Songs of Scotland
3 Lee Mount William Swingler Songs of Scotland
4 Middlesbrough (Milburn's) Herbert Milburn Songs of Scotland
5 Settle J.L. Bulcock Belisario [arr. Round]
